bibl.title: Magical Gems and Classical Archaeology. English Translation by Kata Endreffy.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. 'Magical gems are ugly'. - 2. 'Magical gems are magical'. - 3. 'Magical gems are unfathomable'.

bibl.title: 'Gems of Heaven'. Recent Research on Engraved Gemstones in Late Antiquity, c. AD 200-600

bibl.seg: Árpád M. Nagy, Magical Gems and Classical Archaeology. English Translation by Kata Endreffy.

Chris Entwistle & Noël Adams (edd.), 'Gems of Heaven'. Recent Research on Engraved Gemstones in Late Antiquity, c. AD 200-600 = British Museum Research Publication. 177 (London, 2011) pp. 75-81, 12 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Introduction. - 1. 'Magical gems are ugly'. - 2. 'Magical gems are magical'. - 3. 'Magical gems are unfathomable'.
